name: Mixing Suns
description:
A Visual Novel Bartending Simulator.

Dimensions are disappearing and people are accepting a new reality. But you’re always welcome at Mahalo, a bar renowned across dimensions for serving the most classic cocktails from Earth of Leungli.

Play as Remy, the Master Mixologist. Mix classic and otherworldly cocktails for patrons of all forms and walks of life. When the night winds down, chat with regulars and make new connections that span dimensions.

  • Mix drinks to delight patrons using classic ingredients and out-of-this-world garnishes from Remy's stock!
  • Discover new recipes and ingredients!
  • Relax and chat with interdimensional travelers to discover their stories!

This game is an alpha version of the prologue. Be a part of Mixing Suns' development process by providing your feedback in our Community Board or join our Discord to connect with us directly!

Be a part of our journey as we develop our game. Mixing Suns is an independent production. Get an in-depth behind-the-scenes look on Youtube. Check our community links below to be notified of our latest!
